data.title: Ex Machina
data.meta_description: In late 2005, New Line Cinema picked up the rights in making a film based on the Ex Machina comic book series. Seven years later in 2012, Tony Harris issued a statement that he and Brian K. Vaughan had reacquired the rights for the film's adaptation. There haven't been any announcements about...
data.text:
In late 2005, New Line Cinema picked up the rights in making a film based on the Ex Machina comic book series. Seven years later in 2012, Tony Harris issued a statement that he and Brian K. Vaughan had reacquired the rights for the film's adaptation. There haven't been any announcements about the film ever since.

Plot[]

The plot would planned for the film

Why It Was Cancelled[]

DC turn down the script for unknown reasons

Results[]
